com.vmware.vapi.tracing

Interface Tracer


  • public interface Tracer
    An interface for the creation of TracingSpan spans used by the vapi stack

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Tracer NO_OP 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TracingSpan attachServerSpan(HttpServletRequest request)
      Creates a new server span and attaches it to the tracer propagated with the http request.
      TracingSpan createClientSpan(java.lang.String name)
      Creates a new client span and associates it with the current tracing context.

    • Field Detail

      • NO_OP

        static final Tracer NO_OP

    • Method Detail

      • createClientSpan

        TracingSpan createClientSpan(java.lang.String name)
        Creates a new client span and associates it with the current tracing context. If there is no current tracing context, then the newly created span becomes the root.

        TracingSpan#makeCurrent() must be called to activate the span.

        Returns:
        the created TracingSpan

      • attachServerSpan

        TracingSpan attachServerSpan(HttpServletRequest request)
        Creates a new server span and attaches it to the tracer propagated with the http request. If there is no tracer propagated with the request, then the newly created span becomes the root.

        TracingSpan#makeCurrent() must be called to activate the span.

        Parameters:
        request - the request to extract the tracer ID from
        Returns:
        the attached TracingSpan
